name: RoboticsSolutions
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. robo
Developer Terms of Use
des: Talking ERP for Robotics Solutions. Now you can get to know general data points with just a voice command. The skill provides appropriate data points for "today's fee collection", "today's student attendance", "today's staff attendance", "pending enquiries", and many more (to be activated in the coming days). Get real-time information now with the power of Alexa Voice Integration.
